blogs.content:
We are almost products of our habits. From morning to night whatever we do. Each task belongs to our habits. If you are continuously running with productivity issues, then this blog completely helps you to improve your productivity. #### Let you addiction for growth be stronger than addiction for the comfort. # # Productivity begins with action and actions start with the right determination and a positive mental attitude. It all means everything is based on your brain. So first train your brain to improve your productivity. Whether you are a master of self-disciple or struggling to break down a bad habit, addiction affects all of us at some point in our life. However, the addiction we will discuss in this post is not nicotine and caffeine. It's an addiction that becomes more and more prevalent in the human community with each passing year. It's one you may not be aware of: information addiction

> **Information addiction is also like other harmful addictions in our life.** A while back I discussed with various kinds of people enthusiastic learners, bookworms, high-degree receivers, and strugglers who are consistently working to achieve something. I find a widespread similarity in each type of personality that everyone is in the battle of the war. What is happen in war? Each warrior struggles **100%** to defeat the opponents to win the war and save his kingdom. # The same things today's youth is doing. They are consistently receiving the information. They also want to defeat their opponents and win for the sake of a bright future. But here they are doing a big mistake. The data they are consistently receiving. It is not only information but also bad addiction. With the help of the information, you want to fight. It is your real opponent. # Because You have only 24 hours to receive the information, but I think you are still unaware. What is being in the world? here are a few key pieces of data that reveal just how much information we absorb on a daily basis Every minute: # * Facebook users share nearly 2.5 million pieces of content. * Instagram users post nearly 500,000 times. * Twitter user tweeted nearly 350,000 times. * Amazon generates over $283,000 in online sales. * Youtube users upload seventy-two hours of new video content. * Apple users download nearly 75,000 apps. * Email users send over 200 million messages. # # According to IBM marketing cloud, 90% of the data in the world today was created in the last two years alone, with 2.5 quintillion bytes of data being created every single day. You need to think about that for a second. For every scroll, letter, book, photo, movie, report, tape, CD, mp3, mp4, Youtube video, short video, painting, and social media post from the beginning of time until now 90% of it was created in the last two years. With new devices, sensors, and technology the data rate will only continue to accelerate. >[*35 things consistently wasting your time.*](https://monumaurya.com/blogs/35-biggest-time-waster-of-your-life?start=15) # The data has been created in last few years. It is almost virous for your brain. It is slowly-slowly making us mentally poor. You have noticed that after operating the social media feel stressed. and This thing you have to give up. I accept it after coming 3G, and 4G. People has been aware but so much careless. They are spending their most precious time on today virous (social media). We need to receive useable data. We should always read what we need. Powerful things happen when you start putting in the work to achieve your goal and you become addicted to the prosses and fall in love with the prosses.

blogs.description: Information addition has been like others disease. It is slowly-slowly making us mentally poor.

blogs.title: Sign of growth mindset
blogs.content:
# Sign of growth mindset
### "Education is not learning of fact but training of the mind to think."


Growth mindset is a special and specific word which we always expect that it should be in our life lifelong. If Every person is doing any type of task in their life. There is one hope behind it and that is growth. It could be here both negative and positive. Growth mindset always goes behind positive things and mixed mindset goes behind negative things but by expecting it is not going to be possible. We know it very well that by expecting, by desiring, and by only our imagination. Nothing happens.
#### Growth is always uncomfortable for us because We have never been here before
# 
Growth mindset always comes from facing uncomfortable zoon and challenges. Growth mindset always focuses on learning new things. It doesn’t matter how much does he know for future challenges. It is eager to take a risk in life. I also believe in more of a leaner than leader and on the other side mixed mindset, it always sticks to what does he know. It doesn’t matter it is wrong or right. This mixed mindset attitude does not let him grow in any field of life. 
#
Growth mindset people continually work on their skills and ability to improve it. they do not let it go every easily. they try harder and harder unless it is been 100% successful. Growth mindset people have unique attitude. They never think for comfort zoon because they are very well aware. Comfort zoon is the enemy of their success and they really don’t want to be fail knowingly. If you are aware of your success obstacle and reasons even than you repeats knowingly than by the God blesses you can’t be success and achieve your goal. 
### When things change inside you. things change around you.
#
Making a mistake is sign of new efforts but knowingly is sign of insignificant man. And learner from mistake is sign of significant man.

Growth mindset people are a great problem solver. This quality makes him unique and different from everyone. On other side mixed mindset people avoid problem and challenges just for their comfort zone and their this habit after some time makes him lazy, complainer, and poor by body and brain both. 
#
Growth mindset people are mentally very strong and on other side mixed mindset people are mentally average. They try once every task if that is not able to be they give up soon and not try with new strategy. Growth mindset people after being fail. They do not give up. Use new strategy and make that possible.  
#### When you procrastinate you also postpone happiness.
blogs.description: Give up your mixed mindset and develop growth mindset and get all happiness you have right. Growth mindset vs mixed mindset

blogs.title: Ultimate secretes to work smartly.
blogs.content:
# Ultimate secret to work smartly Now a days stress has been as part of our life. Everyone has stress by some way. Nobody can refuse that he is completely stress free in life. It's with us because of we ultimately don't know the secret to work smartly. It's our duty to find out ultimate secrete to work smartly to accomplish our goal. Here are four benefits when you start working smartly.
**> It makes time for more rest** **> Help you to reduce or recover from burnout** **> Improve your work-life balance** **> Boosts your work motivation**

## 1. Stop multitasking- There are three types of people in this world. First who procrastinate always for every works and always try how could I be safe from works. second who always keeps on doing every works in his life. these kinds of people never procrastinate and think about quality of works just keeps on doing. and third who never procrastinate and keeps on doing every works in life. They only do quality of works. which creates high value in their life. Third quality we have to develop within us. We don't have to be procrastinator and multitasker (Who always do everything.) We have to stop multitasking as soon as it may be possible because you are not a servant who will always keep on doing everything. There are two percent people in this world who can multitask, but problem is 98% rest of the people are thinking that I am in 2%. Actually, it is really poor mindset. the first secret to work smartly stop multitasking start doing those tasks which helps you 70 to 80% to reach to your destination. Take a pen and pepper and write down one side more important task and one side less important task. More important task is acritical task that create the most significant result. less important task is a time eater and create insignificant result and you have to always start your day with more important tasks. When you stop multitasking you become more focused, get more time to try something new, get new opportunity, become less stress and become more productive in life. this is the first ultimate secret to work smartly. Our brain is life personal computer. When do you open too many tabs in your computer at the same time then how it performs. very slow than before in the same way when you multitask. Your performance become slow than before. Multitasking is a sign of stress and diseased mind and when you focus on only one object you become more productive, stress-free and active > **I am multitasking. I can listen, ignore, and forget at the same time.**
## 2. Create morning routine Start your morning with fabulous planning. Planning shows the direction to move toward. project yourself for the day what all you have to do today and how do you have to begin your day? priorities it when your morning will be active and positive then automatically your whole day will be completely active and positive. Morning in an important time of day. how you spend your morning can often tell you what end of the day you will have. Wake up early and shine before the sunshine. Do not sleep with dream live with dream wake up and make it come true. Wake up before the sun rise. Here is billion dolor morning routine. You must develop all these within you. **> Recall your dream** **> Make your bed** **> Drink a glass of water** **> 10-minute morning meditation** **> 10-to-20-minute stretch** **> Brush your teeth and wash your face** **> Take a one cup of coffee or tea** **> Take a healthy breakfast to fuel your day** **> Read article about something you want to read while eating** **> Review your schedule** **> Write down your to do list** **> Get your day started! you got this**

## 3. Manage your surrounding Before beginning the work, you must minimize distraction. It will help you get focus on work. Generally, there are four kinds of distractions. First visual distractions, second manual distractions, third auditory distractions, and forth cognitive distractions.
#### What Distracts people at work? **> Mobile phone** **> The internet** **> Gossip** **> Social media** **> Smoke break or snack break** **> Emailing** **> Meeting** **> Noisy co-worker** **> Personal problem and worries**
Distraction directly attacks on our productivity and memory According to a new study made by the researcher from Simon Fraser University. **> Better memory = Higher ability to avoid distraction** **> Poorer memory = Lower ability to avoid distraction**
#### The benefits of reducing workplace distraction **> 75% of people say they get more done and are more productive.** **> 57% of people say they feel motivated to do their best.** **> 51% of people say they feel more confident about work tasks.** **> 44% of people say they deliver higher quality of work.**
Ther are many benefits of avoiding the distractions. These are few of those and few percent people say they are more productive in noisy environment. Manage your surrounding distractions and increase your productivity at work. #

## 4. Learn to say no Do not over schedule yourself and become realistic what you can accomplish in single day. Saying no allows you to choose where you should put your time and energy. Saying no to someone it sounds little bit silly, but the truth is you avoid the distraction. You have already scheduled yourself if you do not learn to say anyone it means your inviting the distraction to decrease your productivity at work. Saying no some can create more mental health stability with self-care and build your self-esteem and confidence by setting boundaries.
>[ **Ask deep question to know yourself**](https://monumaurya.com/blogs/deep-life-questions-must-ask-to-yourself) #

## 5. Take breaks Many of us are used to work consistently without taking a break the excuse for not taking a break is a high workload, a deadline, important client, urgent request or urgent project or may be something else. in order to stay sharp and focused it is very important take a break. You can take 5-to-10-minute break, a longer break or you can take break form of short vocation but take a break.

## 6. Track your progress each day When you track your progress, you become more purposeful about work you do. We make a to do list or project ourselves every day before beginning the day. In the end of day, it is not guaranteed that every task will be completed. When you track your progress then you find out that what you have to work on and what is really right for now and what do you have to project yourself tomorrow. While tracking progress level when you see something is completed then your brain releases the dopamine it let you feel happy and motivated.

## 7. Stop caring what people will say If you think about people, then what people will think about you. It is not your duty to think about people. You should always focus on your work. While struggling people will criticize and after success they will admire for your work. They are free to say something before and after both, but you are not free you have a goal.
blogs.description: Learn to work smartly everything in life in order to save your time, energy, money, and getting your focus and getting new opportunity. Accomplish your all desire and dream in life by smart working.

blogs.title: How to become winner in life?
blogs.content:
# How to become winner in life Who is really winner? What does it mean to be a winner? What is winning? Is it any rocket science hard to crack by any common person? Is it like a quantum physics which can not grasp by average student?

Winning is something that everyone can easily achieve. It is for everyone. Winning always not considered by extraordinary things or work. It is always considered by desire what you really want to achieve. **While trying if you fail then do not loss yourself. Accept failure and work on it with determination without blaming yourself. This is the true mindset of a winner.**

The first and last word of every dreamer(**win**). All of us want to always win in every area of life. We want to be success, financially free, good health, good relation, stress-free lifestyle, good friend, and good job, etc. I can't pinpoint exactly what you really want in life unless you are sacrificing your time and dreams for others.

## (1) Be eager to learn everyday something. Great leaders are always a great reader. Learn everyday something it sharp your memory, skill, and ability to solve the problems. Everyday learning empowers us to fight with social virous. All of us know very well about the importance of exercising the body everyday but few of us know about the benefits of exercising the brain. >Rather than cramming your brain with a bunch of information all at once, try taking it slow by simply striving to learn something new every day. - **Frank Elaida** #

## (2) Set priorities Prioritization is always first step to start your day. Work is limitless and time is limited. If you want to complete your work on the time, then you need to immediately priorities your task in order to importance. Prioritization saves your time, energy and open many opportunities in life. Take one pen and pepper and write down your all tasks. One side you have to write most important tasks and one side you have to write less important tasks and you have to always start your day with most important tasks

When you start your day by priority or with important tasks then you get high result in less time and in less energy. Which help you 70% to 80% to reach near your destination and in the rest of the time you can try something new. This is real magic of prioritization and when you began to start day without prioritization then you began to do less and most important task both. You began to do without seeing the end result. and less important tasks always waste your time and energy. >**Priorities your all tasks to become winner. start your day with only most important tasks and get everything you want in life.**

# ## (3) Stay focused In the search of water digging the deep at multiple place some feet better than digging the deep at one place 100 feet for water. Multiple things will come on the way of your goal to distract your focus but with high determination you have to always focus on your goal. Distraction directly attacks on our productivity and memory According to a new study made by the researcher from Simon Fraser University. **> Better memory = Higher ability to avoid distraction** **> Poorer memory = Lower ability to avoid distraction** >**When you stay focused then Your productivity and memory perform on high levels. stay focused always in life.**

## (4) Don't be afraid to fail Don't be afraid to fail. Failure is part of success journey. Failure doesn't mean the end of life, instead it's another way and opportunity to start strongly and wisely. You should not be afraid to fail but afraid to fail the same way again and again. after being fail you must learn a lesson form that and never replete that again in life. This is real attitude of winner. If someone say> I have never been failing in my life. It means. He has never tried in life. You should not be afraid to fail but afraid not to trying ever in life.

## (5) Don't quit Challenges make you more responsible that life without struggle is a life without success. Don't quit and learn not to quit. While trying if you fail then do not give up. Your failure shows you this is not exact way to achieve goal. You need to change your strategy and again you have to consistently try until you do not get that. You want to be a winner and winner never quit and quitter never become winner. Problems come in the way of success. You will have to always short out. Nothing comes in the life easily. You will have to fight for everything. >**If you feel life like quitting then think about why you started**
blogs.description: Who is really winner? What does it mean to be a winner? What is winning? Is it any rocket science hard to crack by any common person? Is it like a quantum physics which can not grasp by average student?

blogs.title: 5 Things to quit right now, Give up these.
blogs.content:
# 5 Things everyone should quit right now Success is name of quitting and accepting something. In this blog I am going to discuss about 5 things which everyone should quite right now. These 5 things are consistently wasting our time, energy, and distracting focus. You need to know what those things are you must quit.

### (1) Stop Trying to please everyone There is not any way to make everyone please, so it is better to save your time and energy instead of making everyone please. You may be tired, weak, and lazy but people's desire will never finish. they will desire one by one. I have seen most of the people are so busy in trying to please their team, family, society, and friends. Let everyone judge you. Let them misunderstand you. Let them gossips about you. Thier opinions are not your problems. You stay kind and commit to love. No matter what ever they do and say and never be afraid of losing people you love and care. You should be afraid of losing yourself while trying to please everyone. Don't feel bad about making an important decision that upsets other people. You are not responsible for their happiness you are responsible for your happiness. I have seen various people who complain about one thing you have not done instead of being thankful of thousands of things you have done for them.

## (2) Living in the past If you don't leave your past in the past, it will destroy your future. Live for what today has to offer, not what yesterday has taken away. Your past is not going to change at any rate and by living in the past you consistently destroying your present and future both. Come out of past zoon and make plan for your today that what you can do better for future. When your past calls you, don't answer it has nothing new to say. There are many disadvantages of living in the past causes' negative vibration that not only effect on your mind but also your health. It can lead to stress, anxiety, depression, insomnia, obesity, and anorexia. You always feel like tired all the time and you are not able to stay productive at work. Come out of your past zoon and live with bright present the only things you can do is to accept it and learn from it and move on for better and brighter life. It's waiting. Have you ever realized that how much time do you have total. I think that nobody knows the exact time how much does he have? Someone has died in 20 years someone 30 years, someone 60 someone before 20 years. It means. There is not any guarantee of life. You should enjoy every moment of life. stop worrying about past think about you present brighter and happier. >**Life begin when you learn to be happy.**

## (3) Putting yourself down. Somehow you need to find out core of you. Who are you from inside? Your values, your beliefs, your power, your desires, your dream once you understand. There is only one you. You are unique. There is not anyone like you. Do not judge yourself by surrounded people thoughts. Once you come out their zone and see, feel, and imagine your real power What you can always do consistently best? Don’t worry about field, scopes, and competitors When you are the best then nothing can stop you. >**“Most of our decision big or small are made unconsciously and involve emotion.” Hundreds of decisions are made every day.** >**Hundreds of decisions are made every day, we don’t make every decision through logical way. Even big or small we think we are making logically but research show that Most of our decision big or small are made unconsciously and involve emotion.** ### Know yourself first Before beginning the journey of being extraordinary you need to really know about yourself. It is your first duty. Do not begin this journey by surrounded people appreciations because you know well enough about yourself than others. You know well about your strength, weakness, cause of happiness, stress, anger, excitement, motivation, and ability. You do not have select your career path by other appreciations or by looking someone life style because by his life style you can only judge his positive angle not negative angle. Negative angle is hard work, learning, demotivation, failure, and stress while doing that. These are negative words but it could be for you while doing that perhaps maybe you could not bear this level hard work, demotivation, failure and stress. And at this situation your strength become weakness and your weakness become a big problem for you.

Walk away from people who put you down. Walk away from fights that will never be resolve. Walk away from social virous. Walk away negative self-talker. Walk away from society who does not understand your worth. The more you walk away from things that poison your soul the heathier you become in life.

Make a list of positive things that you love to do and practice it again and again. Do something better for others which brings smile on face. try something new that you had thinked in the past. You will do. Set a goal for brighter future and exercise every day and stay positive and active all the time.

## (4) Overthinking Overthinking itself is not a mental illness, it is associated with conditions including depression, anxiety, eating disorder and substance use disorders. It is just a painful reminder that you care way too much, even when you shouldn't. In one word I use to say the art of creating problems.

## (5) Fear of change Fear of change is also known as metathesiophobia. Those who have metathesiophobia may experience anxiety, depression, fatigue, stress and pain. The fear of change may come from family, childhood experience, personal outlook, current condition, and just the way people are programmed.
blogs.description: What those 5 things to quit right now to overcome on your upcoming problems. What are those things which are consistently making you weak from inside. Give up those negatives

blogs.title: Stop yourself from instant gratification...
blogs.content:
## Stop yourself from Instant gratification If I offer you yummy chocolate with one condition that if you do not eat it till week then I will offer you again two more chocolate and if you do not eat these two chocolates till One week more then I will offer you again five more chocolate. can you make in possible for five chocolate or you will satisfy yourself in one or two chocolates. How would you react? Could you hold out for the greater rewards? Do not doubted. It is sure. You will get but if you wait.

This concept is referred to as "Instant pleasure" or Instant gratification and It has been one of the silent killers of many dreams and goal. It has been most terrible habit in our life. We always want to forget the short-term pain, but the biggest problem is instant gratification provide instant pleaser and long-term pain. What do you really want. Do you want short pleasure and long-term pain or short-term pain and long-term pleasure in life. if you want long term pleasure then you will have to completely stop yourself from instant gratification.
>**People who grow up without sense of how today has affected by yesterday are unlikely to have strong sense of how today can affect tomorrow**- Lynne Cheney Do not allow yourself and other for instant gratification because this is not right way to use your higher potential. Eighty seven percent people spend more than one third of their life with no passion and seventy six percent people now are activity disengaged and I don't like what they do.
Instant gratification can often lead to procrastinate. I consider it a form of self-sabotage and people who caught up in the instant pleasure trap often expect result. they invest meager effort blowing thousands of dollars in the process, then get frustrated when they don't see result. I am here to tell you it simply doesn't work that way. Too much instant gratification can cause long-term dissatisfaction. Most of us don't be the part of process, they just want to be the part of outcome, but the process is where you figure out your real worth.
### Consider it once for better life.
**If you delay the gratification of skipping or sleeping in and go for a run instead, you will become stronger and more energetic.** **If you delay the gratification of watching Netflix after a long day at your 9-to-5 and work on your side business, you will be able to quit you job sooner.** **If you delay the gratification buying junk food at the store and you will eat healthier food when you come at home then you feel better and you can also save your money.** **If you delay the gratification of going out and parting until you have earned it, you will avoid the stress of unfinished work.** **If you delay the gratification of buying nice things until you have the money, you will appreciate your purchases more, knowing you genuinely earned them.**
blogs.description: Instant gratification gives us short term pleasure and long-term pain. and it is silent killer of your dream. Stop yourself from instant gratification.
